        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        html - the HTML to validate.
        doctype - optional doctype.
        document - indicates if the HTML represents a document (true) or a document fragment (false).

      • isDirectInput

        public boolean isDirectInput()
        Description copied from interface: MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Test if the request is for direct input.
        Specified by:
        isDirectInput in interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Returns:
        true indicates the request contains the HTML; false indicates the request has a URL to retrieve the HTML.

      • isDocument

        public boolean isDocument()
        Description copied from interface: MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Test if the request represents a document or a document fragment. If a fragment, MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest.isDirectInput() must return true.
        Specified by:
        isDocument in interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Returns:
        true for a document; false for a document fragment.

      • isPreferInternal

        public boolean isPreferInternal()
        Description copied from interface: MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Test if the request would prefer using an internal validator. The default is true.
        Specified by:
        isPreferInternal in interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isXML

        public boolean isXML()
        Description copied from interface: MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Indicates if the content for direct input is XML. Ignored if validating a URL since the content type will indicate.
        Specified by:
        isXML in interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
        Returns:
        true or false.
